full_summary:
### Advanced Contract Award Notice for Rental Services of Firearms Indoor Range Facility

#### Overview

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is issuing an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) to pre-qualify suppliers interested in providing rental services for a firearms indoor range facility. This ACAN serves as a public notice indicating the CBSA's intention to award a contract for the rental of an additional firearms range facility in the Greater Toronto Area/Waterloo Region.

#### Project Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** CB-5107-45967358
* **Project Title:** Rental services for firearms indoor range facility
* **Commodity/Service Code (UNSPSC):** Lease and rental of property or building
* **Notice Type:** Advanced Contract Award Notice
* **Publication Date:** 2023-04-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-15T14:00:00

#### Requirements

The CBSA requires the rental services of an additional firearms range facility to provide armed Border Services Officers with firearms training, in accordance with prescribed standard policies. The tasks and deliverables include:

* Provision of firearms range for approximately 120 days per year
* Provision of safety procedures

#### Security Requirements

No security requirements are associated with this project.

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Period:** July 1, 2023, to June 30, 2024, with the option to extend the contract for four additional one-year periods.

#### Supplier Information

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described in this ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Marie-Pier Leblanc
* Email: marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca

#### Supplementary Documents

The following documents are available for download:

* [English] ACAN PR71026 - Acan_en_0.pdf
* [English] CBSA Standards on Firing Ranges.pdf
* [French] Normes de l'ASFC sur les champs de tir.pdf
* [French] ACAN PR71026 - Acan_fr_0.pdf
